column2: To legitimize our rule over all of our Chinese subjects, we need to claim the Mandate of Heaven
After uniting our Jurchens brethren, it is time to form our own empire that can match the Ming
Commission Another Voyage to the West.

After the voyage of Zheng He, and with the now more increasing presence of westerners within our realm, we can commission another voyage expeditions to learn more about their way of life and possibly learn their technology.

The increasingly unpopular union between Sweden and Norway has steadily becoming a major problem, such probelm could erupt into bloody internal rebellions. We can however propose a peaceful resolution to dissolve our union with Norway.
We have succesfully finish our voyage and bring knowledge, skills and goods from the west.
